metadata.title: CVE-2018-13845 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue has been found in HTSlib 1.8. It is a buffer over-read insam_parse1 in sam.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-13845` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htslib-test - 1.2.1-2ubuntu1+esm1
libhts1 - 1.2.1-2ubuntu1+esm1
tabix - 1.2.1-2ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: htslib package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.1-2ubuntu1+esm1').
